document.full_text: britain's rory mcilroy was clinging to a one-shot lead midway through the third round at the masters on saturday as the challengers started to make their move.
document.title: rory mcilroy hangs on to slim lead at augusta
lines_and_colors: britain's rory mcilroy was clinging to a one-shot lead midway through the third round at the masters on saturday as the challengers started to make their move.
